text: |} The King Charles II Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Great Britain open to horses aged three years only. It is run at Newmarket over a distance of 7 furlongs (1,408 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in May. ==Records== Leading jockey (3 wins): *Ray Cochrane – Rawnak (1988), Magical Strike (1989), Eurolink Thunder (1993)) Leading trainer (4 wins): *Sir Michael Stoute – Magical Strike (1989), Jeremy (2006), Thikriyaat (2016), Taamol (2017) ==Winners since 1988== {| class =
